originalText.text: I had the pleasure of being a part of Counseling Center Group's individual therapy program and I am so glad that I did. My therapist was incredibly knowledgeable, kind, and caring. They made sure to create an environment where I felt safe and comfortable sharing my thoughts and feelings. Every session was meaningful and helpful in helping me work through my issues. The counselor also provided me with tools to help manage my emotions outside of our sessions which have been invaluable. Overall, it has been a great experience working with Counseling Center Group's individual therapy program! Five stars all around!!

originalText.text: I had the pleasure of attending a group session at the Counseling Center and it was one of the best experiences I have ever had. The counselors were extremely knowledgeable and provided an environment that was both safe and supportive. Everyone in the group felt comfortable sharing their stories, which created a strong sense of connection between all members. The counselors facilitated meaningful conversations, offered helpful advice and guidance, as well as encouraged us to exercise self-care throughout our journey towards healing. Overall, I highly recommend Counseling Center Group for anyone seeking counseling services; they truly offer five star quality care!

originalText.text: I am so grateful to have found the Counseling Center Group! I have been married for 15 years and have been struggling with communication issues in my marriage. After just a few months of working with the counselors at Counseling Center Group, my marriage has improved drastically. The counselors are knowledgeable, caring, and patient. They provided us with helpful tools to better understand each other's needs and emotions as well as strategies to improve our communication skills. We both feel more connected than ever before! I highly recommend Counseling Center Group for anyone looking for marriage counseling services - they truly are five-star professionals!

originalText.text: I recently attended the Counseling Center Group and was truly amazed by the experience. The group provided amazing support, guidance and understanding in a safe and comfortable environment. I have been struggling with many different issues for a long time, but after attending the group, my outlook has changed drastically with help from the counselors. I learned about Emotional Freedom Technique (EFT) which has helped me to deal with my emotions in a healthier way. The staff is incredibly caring and knowledgeable which made it easy to open up about my struggles. I highly recommend this counseling center for anyone looking for an effective way to work through their issues!

originalText.text: I had the pleasure of working with the counseling center group in New York and I could not be more pleased with my experience. My therapist was welcoming, understanding and professional. They provided me with helpful tools to help alleviate stress and anxiety that I was dealing with in my life. Each session was tailored to my specific needs and goals, making sure we stayed on track throughout our sessions together. The staff is knowledgeable about various issues such as depression, relationships, work/life balance etc., which made it easy to open up without fear of judgment or stigma. All around great experience! Highly recommend this counseling center group!
